meanings.definition: Able to be chosen or picked out
meanings.sent1: The menu had many selectable options for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The selectable colors for the car included red, blue, and green.
meanings.sent3: I found a selectable pair of socks that matched perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was a garden of selectable outfits waiting to be plucked.
meanings.sent5: The selectable candies in the jar sparkled like gems.

meanings.sent1: The computer program had a list of selectable fonts to choose from.
meanings.sent2: The selectable songs on the playlist were all my favorites.
meanings.sent3: He joked that the selectable remote control was too smart for its own good.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky seemed like selectable dreams waiting to be picked.
meanings.sent5: The selectable books on the shelf whispered stories of adventure.

meanings.sent1: Only the selectable candidates will be considered for the job.
meanings.sent2: The selectable students will attend the special field trip.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was a selectable member of the family.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden were like selectable guests at a party.
meanings.sent5: The selectable prizes at the fair gleamed under the bright lights.
